QuestData.Title: Blinding the Eye
QuestData.Description:
Ah yes, just the $c I wanted to see.
I can still sense his touch lingering upon you. Our victory over the god of the deep will not be complete until we remove all traces of his infection.
Through my research I have learned a less painful way of removing the infection.
Speak with me, and let's put an end to this nightmare.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Brother Pike to cleanse your "gift".
